title: rules
description: Optionally configurable rules for game mechanics, unit availability, economics, etc.

documentation.description: Human friendly documentation that can be stored with the (human unfriendly) JSON. For optimized systems, this attribute should be pruned at run time.

diceStandard.description: The number of sides available on the standard die used when generating most of the psuedo-random dice rolls in-game.

name.description: Rule sets need a distinct name and should say something about the rules defined within.

unitStrengthMax.description: After all bonuses are considered, cap the effective strength of an army at this value. It should be at least one less than the maximum value rolled by a standard dice.

unitStrengthMin.description: After all strength modifications are considered, provide a floor for the effective strength below which an army unit won't fall.
